channel.title: Comments on: 10 Questions with Apologies to Bernard Pivot & James Lipton

item.title: By: Ryan White
item.dc:creator: Ryan White
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2018/11/02/10-questions-with-apologies-to-bernard-pivot-james-lipton-26/#comment-838">Joanna Kang</a>.
Hi Lisa, Thanks. The pic is of my DJing in Golden Gate Park on a unseasonably warm day.
Lisa and Joanna, I always hate to manage someone making a burrito for me at a tacqueria but I just need to insist on them adding more and more spice and sauce to the plate. They will accommodate my request normally and be amused by the amount of sauce I want. I'm hungry now. ;)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joanna Kang.

Hi Lisa,
Thanks. The pic is of my DJing in Golden Gate Park on a unseasonably warm day.

Lisa and Joanna,
I always hate to manage someone making a burrito for me at a tacqueria but I just need to insist on them adding more and more spice and sauce to the plate. They will accommodate my request normally and be amused by the amount of sauce I want. I’m hungry now. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Ryan White
item.dc:creator: Ryan White
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2018/11/02/10-questions-with-apologies-to-bernard-pivot-james-lipton-26/#comment-839">Evans Whitaker</a>.
Hi Whit, My dad lives in Ojai now. Indeed a small world. it is beautiful there. Often times 40 degrees warmer than where I live in the Sunset District.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Evans Whitaker.

Hi Whit,
My dad lives in Ojai now. Indeed a small world. it is beautiful there. Often times 40 degrees warmer than where I live in the Sunset District.

item.title: By: Evans Whitaker
item.dc:creator: Evans Whitaker
item.description: I grew up just down the grade from you in Ojai. I remember the citrus scent as well (mostly oranges in Ojai). Small world! Whit
item.content:encoded: I grew up just down the grade from you in Ojai. I remember the citrus scent as well (mostly oranges in Ojai). Small world! Whit

item.title: By: Lisa Leiva
item.dc:creator: Lisa Leiva
item.description: I love your picture Ryan, you need to tell me where I can get that burrito you described!
item.content:encoded: I love your picture Ryan, you need to tell me where I can get that burrito you described!
